data.title: Meetings & Events at The Peninsula Manila
data.meta_description: Discover the perfect event venue for your next function or celebration at The Peninsula Manila, the trusted choice for events place in the city.
data.text: It comes as no surprise that Manila's business-savvy continue to return to The Peninsula as the venue of choice for important meetings, conferences, private dinners and cocktail events. When it comes to planning important functions, the hotelâ€™s trusted team of professionals get it right every time, with five-star catering, exclusive personalized service and an array of venues equipped with the latest in audio visual technology to impress and enhance any event.
